original_title: Shooting in Habaraduwa leaves one dead, another injured
original_body_lines: A 38-year-old man was killed while another was injured in a shooting near the Polduwa Buddhist temple in Habaraduwa today, Police said.
The injured individual has been identified as the wife of the deceased.
According to the preliminary investigations, two gunmen on a motorcycle had reportedly opened fire at the couple who was travelling in a three-wheeler.
Further investigations into the incident are being carried out by the Police.
